content: Yes, there are plenty of cafes and restaurants near the Mount Maunganui Summit Track where you can grab a bite to eat after your hike. In fact, the base of the Mount Maunganui Summit Track is surrounded by a vibrant tourism hub that has several dining options where you can enjoy a sit-down meal or grab a quick takeaway to refuel after your hike. Some popular options include The Rising Tide, a gastro pub with great food and craft beers, and the Mount Bistro, which offers delicious breakfast and brunch options. Another great option is the Little Prince Cafe, which serves up fresh and wholesome food in a cozy and relaxed setting.
